description: This file sets up database connectivity and session management for a FastAPI-based finance tracker backend, including engine configuration, session creation, and a utility function to test database connection.

methods.name: test_db_connection
methods.description: Tests the database connection, checking file existence and writability for SQLite, or connectivity for other databases.

methods.name: get_db
methods.description: Provides a database session as a generator, suitable as a dependency in FastAPI endpoints.
